name: tm29
effect: Teaches Psychic to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Psychic to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.
